SEARCH
Module com.flashcardapp
Package com.flashcardapp.logic

Class SpacedRepetitionAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
com.flashcardapp.logic.SpacedRepetitionAlgorithm
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAlgorithm
public class SpacedRepetitionAlgorithm extends Object implements IAlgorithm
An implementation of the spaced repetition algorithm for studying flashcards.
